title: Onsite playground, Gourmet kitchen island, Private balcony or patio
neighborhood: 285 E Del Amo Blvd, Carson, CA
posting_body: Evolve South Bay is a place where we collaborate with our residents to redefine apartment living.
Our vibrant community, located in the heart of Carson, offers an exciting and engaging lifestyle with refined amenities in our new development apartment homes.
Each one of our pet friendly apartment homes come fully equipped with energy-efficient stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, private balconies, in-home washer and dryer, and much more.
-Fenced dog park with pet watering station
-Relaxing resort-style pool with cabanas Photo Featured amenity
-Two-story resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen Photo Featured amenity
-Close proximity to beaches, LAX, sporting venues, and restaurants
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
